front.title: An Extension for Watcher Information History

abstract.t: This document defines an extension to the Session Initiation Protocol(SIP) watcher information template-package. This extension enables asubscriber to request for a list of past watcher information eventsover some time period. This document defines a mechanism forrequesting watcher information history in subscriptions to thewatcherinfo template-package. It also defines an extension to thewatcher information data format for representing this historyinformation.
